form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Title: MEMORANDUM OF CREATION OF RECORD OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE, Form Number: 1-357

full_text: IMPORTANT: PLEASE READ INSTRUCTIONS ON BACK OF PAGE ONE BEFORE FILLING OUT MEMORANDUM * U.S. GOVERNMENT PRINTING OFFICE: 1979 + 293-241 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service MEMORANDUM OF CREATION OF RECORD OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE Place NC File No, A20866879 Status as a lawful permanent resident of the United States is accorded: SEX DATE OF BIRTH Name Street 3033 Srighton / 4 STATE Leib Jomchinsky M 3-22-06 Address PLACE OF BIRTH City, State, Zip Brooklyn ny 11235 USSR NATIONALITY COUNTRY TO WHICH CHARGEABLE (If any) PREFERENCE (If any) Stateless P7-6 PRIORITY DATE REMARKS NONPREFERENCE: Section 212 (a)(14) certification not required because: Individual section 212 (a) (14) certification issued Blanket section 212 (a) (14) certification issued under the following provision of law: Sec 203(h) of the I & N Act Sec 249 of the I & N Act Sec 214(d) I & N Act Private Law no. of the Sec 244 ( )( ) of the I & N Act Sec 1 of the Act of 11/2/66 Congress session Sec 245 of the I & N Act Sec 13 of the Act of 9/11/57 (203(a)(7) of 10 26 77 at nyc (Other law Specify) As (Month) (Day) PORT OF ENTRY FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE Class of admission (Insert symbol) P7-6 (Year) DATE OF RECOMMENDED BY: (Immigration Officer) (Date) ACTION APPROVED usting Bankone 12-14-82 141932 DISTRICT FOR USE BY VISA CONTROL OFFICE MADE PROCESSED FOR Date TEMPORARY EVIDENCE OF LAWFUL ADMISSION FOR Foreign State PERMANENT RESIDENCE VALID UNTIL 12-13-83 Preference Category. EMPLOYMENT AUTHORIZED Number Month of Issuance Signed (Visa Office, Dept. of State) Form 1-357 delivered Form 1-151 Serial No. mailed delivered CC: Visa Control Office, Visa Office, Department of State, Washington, D.C. 20520 for allocation of immigrant visa number.
